title.narrative: CAPACITIES TO ANALYZE AND USE INFORMAT

description.narrative: By 2016, national, regional and local governments have improved capacities to analyze and use information and evidences in the formulation of children and adolescents oriented policies and programmes, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF generated knowledge and evidence contribute to the formulation and management of public policies and to the monitoring of the CRC

participating-org.narrative: FONDAZIONE L ALBERO DELLA VITA ONLUS
FUNDACION IBEROAMERICANA DE DERECHOS DE INFANCIA Y FAMILIA

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2016, national, regional and local governments have improved capacities to analyze and use information and evidences in theformulation of children and adolescents oriented policies and programmes
